name.en-US: Hotel - NYT - New York Times Square

shortDescription.en-US: Walk to dozens of top attractions in Midtown Manhattan from our boutique hotel in Times Square, New York City.

content.value: The Crossroads of the World, Midtown Manhattan‚Äì whatever you call Times Square, you'll be sleeping right next to it (in the centre of it all). With 8 subway lines just outside, you've got the best of NYC at your fingertips. Rockefeller Center, 5th Avenue, Central Park, and Broadway? They're just a casual jaunt from your bed. As night falls, raise a glass to the city's beat at our rooftop bar. When it‚Äôs time to nod off, our XL beds and soundproof windows are your silent partners in crime for the best sleep of your life.

altText.en-US: Picture of hotel NYT hotel facade
Queen Beatrix of The Netherlands 1985 c Andy Warhol

content.value: Andy Warhol needs little introduction. He‚Äôs the Pop Art pioneer that brought us some of the twentieth century‚Äôs most iconic images: the Marilyn Diptych (1962), Self Portrait (1986) and, of course, Campbell‚Äôs Soup Cans (1962). Across prints, photos, films and books he explored the celebrity culture, advertising and artistic expression as each flourished in the 1960s. Today, his works accounts for some of the most expensive paintings ever sold: ‚ÄòSilver Car Crash (Double Disaster)‚Äô (1963) raked in an eye-watering $105 million.

name.en-US: Art - NYT - Andy Warhol Queen Beatrix of the Netherlands
Faq - Global - Book, modify, cancel reservation

question.en-US: How do I book, modify, cancel a reservation?

content.value: We like to make things quick and easy for you ‚Äì that's why all citizenM reservations are done online. You'll find our best rates and availability¬†here. Just a few clicks and you're done! No phone calls or emails necessary.
How do I change the dates of the booking via citizenM?
Did you book a prepay rate via the citizenM website or app?

When you book the prepay rate, there is a 24-hour cancellation window and a full refund will be given. You can then book a new stay. After 24 hours pass, no refunds or changes are possible. You can change dates until 72 hours before arrival (11.59 PM local hotel time); guest name and hotel are not changeable. If the new rate is higher, the difference is paid at check-in. If lower, guests forfeit the difference. To change, contact our customer service team via the chat box, or via WhatsApp at +44 744 417 1707 (text only).
Did you book a flexible, long stay, mycitizenM or mycitizenM+ rate via the citizenM website or app?
If you booked a flexible, long stay, mycitizenM or mycitizenM+ rate directly on our website, you can cancel your reservation via¬†'my booking', and then book a new stay.
How do I change the dates of the booking if I did not book via citizenM?

For all third-party bookings (these are all bookings not made via the citizenM website or app), any cancellations or modifications must be done via that channel. Please check your confirmation email for details and terms of your booking, and contact your channel directly.
How can I cancel the booking if I booked via citizenM?

It's too bad you cannot make it, we were looking forward to seeing you! If you have booked directly through the citizenM website, you can cancel your booking yourself via my¬†booking page. Depending on the rate type you chose, you may or may not be charged. You can also contact our customer service team via the chat box, or via WhatsApp at +44 744 417 1707 (text only).
How can I cancel the booking if I booked elsewhere?

It's too bad you cannot make it, we were looking forward to seeing you! If you booked through a third party (for example, another website, your travel agent, etc), you will need to cancel the reservation directly with them. You will likely find their contact details in the reservation confirmation email. Depending on the rate type chosen at time of booking, you may or may not be charged.

name.en-US: Faq - NYT - How do I get to the hotel

question.en-US: How do I get to the hotel?

content.value: Unfortunately, citizenM does not provide shuttles. But feel free to arrange your own. Most airports provide these services.
